field.name: showEmptyTab
field.label: Show empty Tab
field.description: Display the GalleryFavourits-Tab even when the user has no favourites

field.name: showPublic
field.label: Display favoured images to Public
field.description: Enable, if everybody should see a user\'s favourites. Otherwise, only the user will see the favourites tab in his profile

field.name: showCategory
field.label: Display Category Path
field.description: Show the category path the picture is in under the title

field.name: categoryfilter
field.label: Display only from categories
field.description: Enter a comma-separated list of category-IDs to display only pictures from these categories (e.g. "1,5,6"). Leave empty (default) to show pictures from all categories. This option requires JoomGallery 1.0.1, 1.5, or later!

field.name: picsperpage
field.label: Pictures per Page
field.description: Leave empty (default) to use the setting from the JoomGallery component

field.name: numcols
field.label: Number of columns
field.description: Leave empty (default) to use the setting from the JoomGallery component

field.name: pagination
field.label: Display pagination (otherwise only first page)
field.description: Spreads the images over several pages. If disabled, only the first page will be displayed, containing the # of pics entered above

field.name: hidebackend
field.label: Hide images uploaded from Backend
field.description: If enabled, no pictures that were uploaded from the Admin backend are shown on the tab.

field.name: showauthor
field.label: Show image author
field.description: Displays the author of the image.
